from langflow.base.data.utils import IMG_FILE_TYPES, TEXT_FILE_TYPES
from langflow.base.io.chat import ChatComponent
from langflow.inputs import BoolInput
from langflow.io import DropdownInput, FileInput, MessageTextInput, MultilineInput, Output
from langflow.schema.message import Message
from langflow.utils.constants import MESSAGE_SENDER_AI, MESSAGE_SENDER_NAME_USER, MESSAGE_SENDER_USER
from langflow.schema.image import Image

class ChatInput(ChatComponent):
    display_name = "Chat Input"
    description = "Get chat inputs from the Playground."
    icon = "MessagesSquare"
    name = "ChatInput"

    inputs = [
        MultilineInput(
            name="input_value",
            display_name="Text",
            value="",
            info="Message to be passed as input.",
        ),
        BoolInput(
            name="should_store_message",
            display_name="Store Messages",
            info="Store the message in the history.",
            value=True,
            advanced=True,
        ),
        DropdownInput(
            name="sender",
            display_name="Sender Type",
            options=[MESSAGE_SENDER_AI, MESSAGE_SENDER_USER],
            value=MESSAGE_SENDER_USER,
            info="Type of sender.",
            advanced=True,
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="sender_name",
            display_name="Sender Name",
            info="Name of the sender.",
            value=MESSAGE_SENDER_NAME_USER,
            advanced=True,
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="session_id",
            display_name="Session ID",
            info="The session ID of the chat. If empty, the current session ID parameter will be used.",
            advanced=True,
        ),
        FileInput(
            name="files",
            display_name="Files",
            file_types=TEXT_FILE_TYPES + IMG_FILE_TYPES,
            info="Files to be sent with the message.",
            advanced=True,
            is_list=True,
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="background_color",
            display_name="Background Color",
            info="The background color of the icon.",
            advanced=True,
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="chat_icon",
            display_name="Icon",
            info="The icon of the message.",
            advanced=True,
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="text_color",
            display_name="Text Color",
            info="The text color of the name",
            advanced=True,
        ),
    ]
    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Message", name="message", method="message_response"),
    ]

    from PIL import Image as PILImage
    from io import BytesIO
    import base64
    
    def pil_to_base64(image: PILImage) -> str:
        buffered = BytesIO()
        image.save(buffered, format="PNG")
        img_str = base64.b64encode(buffered.getvalue())
        return img_str.decode("utf-8")
    
    def message_response(self) -> Message:
        # Convert image files to base64
        base64_files = []
        for file in self.files:
            if isinstance(file, Image):
                base64_files.append(pil_to_base64(file))
            else:
                base64_files.append(file)

        message = Message(
            text=self.input_value,
            sender=self.sender,
            sender_name=self.sender_name,
            session_id=self.session_id,
            files=base64_files,
        )

        if (
            self.session_id
            and isinstance(message, Message)
            and isinstance(message.text, str)
            and self.should_store_message
        ):
            store_message(
                message,
                flow_id=self.graph.flow_id,
            )
            self.message.value = message

        self.status = message
        return message
